content.rendered:
Air Malta plc is the flag carrier airline of Malta, with its headquarters in Luqa and its hub at Malta International Airport. It was founded on 1973. It operates services to destinations in Europe, Middle East and North Africa.

View Air Malta Hand / Cabin | Checked Baggage Allowance and Excess Baggage rates in the below link

Air Malta Checked Baggage

Air Malta Excess Baggage

Air Malta Hand | Cabin Baggage

Air Malta Offices Worldwide

Find Air Malta Reservation | Town | Sales | Airport Offices Contact details such as Address, Phone number, Location, Email and more details in your country
